member.name: TOOLTIP_DISMISS_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that indicate whether a window is registered or unregistered to receive tooltip dismiss notifications.

member.name: TOOLTIP_DISMISS_FLAGS.TDF_REGISTER
member.summary: The window is registered to receive tooltip dismiss notifications.

member.name: TOOLTIP_DISMISS_FLAGS.TDF_UNREGISTER
member.summary: The window is unregistered from receiving tooltip dismiss notifications.
